\textbf{RAY PERRY}

\normalsize
\end{flushright}

\
\large
\begin{spacing}{0.5}

\textbf{\emph{Summary}}

\end{spacing}
\normalsize
\rule{\textwidth}{1pt}

Hard-working, adaptable, generalist with over nine years of experience
in full-stack web development. Self-starter; works well in a team
environment and approaches problems with a \textquotedblleft can-do\textquotedblright{}
attitude. Prioritizes effectively and works under deadlines with ease.
Has lead multiple teams in high-pressure situations. Understands what
needs to be done and acts accordingly, learning additional roles when
required. Offers a fresh perspective to situations and is not afraid
to ask questions.

\
\large

\large
\begin{spacing}{0.5}

\textbf{\emph{Work Experience (Full-time)}}

\end{spacing}
\normalsize
\rule{\textwidth}{1pt}

\textbf{\emph{ThoughtWorks}} | Senior Consultant | December 2019 --
present

\small

Worked with a large fast-service restaurant chain to augment 
and integrate payment terminals with previous-generation 
transaction gateway and vendor APIs.

\normalsize
\

\textbf{\emph{Oranj}} | Full Stack Engineer | December 2017 -- December
2019

\small

Worked on a suite of advisor, investor, and analytics applications,
focused on account aggregation and rebalancing. Built a meta-object
browser to facilitate the association of entities across multiple
systems.

\normalsize
\

\textbf{\emph{PMMI Media Group}} | Sr. Web Developer | August 2017
-- November 2017

\small

Worked on a data aggregation tool that consumed data from IBM Silverpop,
Salesforce, and a Redis cache.

\normalsize
\

\textbf{\emph{QuikOrder, Inc.}} | JavaScript Engineer | February 2016
-- July 2016

\small

Maintained and augmented multi-purpose food order system. Integrated
multiple third-party APIs. Added smart localization that adhered to
WCAG, I18n, and a11y standards. Created various middleware for our
Node.js-based system.

\normalsize
\

\textbf{\emph{RDI/A Digital}} | Web Developer | March 2014 -- March
2015

\small

Deployed multiple to-spec sites for Publicis Health Media, PAC12,
The NFL Network, Delta Faucets.

\normalsize
